newsitem.title: USA: Insilco to sell Rolodex business to Newell.
newsitem.headline: Insilco to sell Rolodex business to Newell.

text.p: Insilco Corp said on Wednesday that it has agreed to sell its Rolodex business unit to Newell Co for $117 million.
Rolodex sales are estimated at $68 million for 1996, Insilco said.
Insilco said it retained Goldman Sachs in October 1996 to review strategic alternatives to boost shareholder value, including the sale of Rolodex.
